<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create a ExecutorProcessControl-based DebugObjectRegistrar that emits debug</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// objects to the GDB JIT interface. This will use the EPC&#39;s lookupSymbols</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// method to find the registration/deregistration  function addresses by name.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If RegistrationFunctionsDylib is non-None then it will be searched to find</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the registration functions. If it is None then the process dylib will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loaded to find the registration functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
